product_name: Moxie Cycling T-Back Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: It's no surprise that if you feel good, you'll ride well. The women's T-Back Bike Jersey from Moxie is a gem of a motivator. Striking T-shape back, scoop neck in front and longer length give you great style. Moxie T-Back Bike Jersey for women has ergonomic seams that prevent chafing. Moisture-wicking fabric moves sweat away when you're working hard and dries fast to keep you comfortable. Built-in support bra has removable cups. Backpax(TM) pocketing in back features 3 standard cycling pockets and a large, hidden zippered pouch big enough for a jacket.
short_description: It's no surprise that if you feel good, you'll ride well. The women's T-Back Bike Jersey from Moxie is a gem of a motivator.
